author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BARRY DISSIPATES OVER EASTERN MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAIN STILL EXPECTED TO CONTINUE THROUGHOUT THE DAY...
summary: ...BARRY DISSIPATES OVER EASTERN MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAIN STILL EXPECTED TO CONTINUE THROUGHOUT THE DAY... As of 4:00 AM CDT Mon Jun 30 the center of Barry was located near 23.0, -99.2 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary for Remnants of Barry (AT2/AL022025)
